Bitlash Sightings

Here are some links to interesting things people have done with Bitlash.

Send us your link and we'll be happy to include it.

* Rugged Circuits sells a family of products called the GATOR Board based on the Atmel ATMega324P and has been kind enough to link to Bitlash on their software page.

* coopermaa from the Arduino Forums has published a Guide to learning Arduino in Chinese

* Here's an Arduino Terminal based on Bitlash on Github
